name: Emergency Grants to Address Mental and Substance Use Disorders During COVID-19
objective: This program is to provide mental and substance use disorder treatment, crisis counseling, and other related supports for children and adults impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration
applicant_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act or the CARES Act. Pub. L. H.R.748, 116-136.

rules_regulations:
See 44 CFR 205.
HHS Grants Policy Statement, HHS (Rev.) January 1, 2007.
